title: Mega Bloks DCH55 Big Building Bag, Blue, 60 Pieces
short_description: ​ 60 multi-coloured building blocks, including distinct shapes ​ Ideal for little hands ​ Hands-on play for early childhood development ​ Storage bag for easy clean up ​ Combine with other Mega Bloks preschool toys and build them up  See more product details
